title: sudo -E cron run on travis fails on master -- demands authenticaiton
body:
AFAIK is ok on maint, but fails on master: https://travis-ci.org/github/datalad/datalad/jobs/682067831

```shell
$ http_proxy= PATH=$PWD/../tools/coverage-bin:$PATH $NOSE_WRAPPER `which nosetests` $NOSE_OPTS -A "$NOSE_SELECTION_OP($NOSE_SELECTION) and not(turtle)" --with-doctest --with-cov --cover-package datalad --logging-level=INFO $TESTS_TO_PERFORM
...............
........................................................S....enableremote datastore-storage ok
(recording state in git...)
enableremote datastore-storage ok
(recording state in git...)
enableremote datastore-storage ok
(recording state in git...)
enableremote datastore-storage ok
(recording state in git...)
.S.The authenticity of host 'datalad-test (127.0.0.1)' can't be established.
ECDSA key fingerprint is SHA256:8ff0Hk2I7/JeM6B0VLliG30VgWMVboBej6mp8MhP/Ug.
Are you sure you want to continue connecting (yes/no)? 
No output has been received in the last 10m0s, this potentially indicates a stalled build or something wrong with the build itself.
Check the details on how to adjust your build configuration on: https://docs.travis-ci.com/user/common-build-problems/#build-times-out-because-no-output-was-received
The build has been terminated
```
